predicate.note: Frames file for 'tour' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry.

example.name: pretty basic
example.text: This week, the U.S. auto giant paid for 10 House of Commons members and two House of Lords members to fly to Detroit and tour its operations there.
example.arg: 10 House of Commons members and two House of Lords members
